Class 28

Jan 21, 2018 - Sun

View On Github Download class file

Model, View, Controller (MVC) architecture from web development perspective

Earlier we used to write all view, logic, database stuff in single php file. Which actually very hard to maintain in large scale production. Using mvc pattern we can easily structured our project for large scale website.

Flow of mvc

    R
    C <====> M
    V

When we access certain route it will require a controller. Controller will be logic part which will do necessary operation then require view page. I mean genral structured will be following

    R
    C
    V

However, when we need database manipulation like insert, retrieve, update, delete we will make a model file. And model will communicate with controller.

    C <====> M

In todays example we create model, view, controller for index.php route

├── controllers
│   └── indexController.php # this is my index controller
├── models
│   └── indexModel.php  # this is my index model
└── views
│   └── indexView.php # this is my index view
│
├── index.php

Hope you will understand better if you try @ home. And it will make sense to you. Take care.
